settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)

preset_modes: 13 exposure modes (e.g. night, low light, fireworks)
effects: 11 artistic effect modes (retro, lighter or darker skin tones, small face, etc.)
long_exposure: up to 30 minutes with bulb mode

effects: 13 creative mode settings (retro, miniature, soft focus, etc.)
